content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 i designed this to be an earbud holder but during the mmcal many crocheters came up wth other great uses such as chapstick holder key holder coin holder fidget spinner holder just to name a few this quick & easy project is great for birthday party favors too this pattern was designed for our 3rd mini-mystery crochet along all mmcal projects take small amounts of leftover yarn and a small amount of your time you should be able to complete each segment in less than a half hour join us find all details of our mini-mystery crochet alongs in the information guide on the blog click here 2 to read that short guide find the material list & schedule for the mmcal here https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/mini-mystery-crochet-along-3/ design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity & craftsy jennifer pionk all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2018 designed by jennifer pionk aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer pionk 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/mini-mystery-crochet-along-3/ 2 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/category/mini-mystery-crochet-along-information-guide/
